description: Get ready to create your own fable in the new Pacer sock. With a debris-blocking micro crew height, targeted cushioning for added durability, and Merino Wool comfort that never takes a nap, its redesigned flex and arch support zones are ready to test if “slow and steady” does indeed go good with LSD (long slow distance … relax).
name: Darn Tough Socks Pacer Micro Crew Ultralight Cushion Socks - Mens
